title: Summoner Icons
body:
This isn't a creation per say but it's a idea, sorta, I don't know about other people but could we get a 'Arrange Summoner Icons' button? Say you have a set of Icons that you switch between after each game, it's annoying scrolling through them all, or the people who ACTUALLY have OCD they can arrange them how they want, etc
Just a thought probably won't happen or even be read but may as well try

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=BioWolf,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=V2Mvygfq,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-17T13:08:55.018+0000)
>
> Sooo still waiting..

You shall continue waiting.
I shall wait forever for an answer o7
Bump, would like to hear what a Red thinks about this
I don't see why not, but at the same time it isn't needed.
Yea it's not needed, but it would be nice, I would love to have one
